Event.name: Cycle count
Event.Description: Counts the number of clock cycles. Every clock cycle increments the counter

Event.name: L1 D-Cache access
Event.Description: Counts the number of data-cache accesses (read hits / misses and write hits / misses)

Event.name: D-TLB miss
Event.Description: Counts the number of TLB misses for data entries

Event.name: Branch mispredicted
Event.Description: Counts the number of times branch prediction causes the wrong branch to be prefetched

Event.name: Write buffer write beat
Event.Description: Counts the number times the bus returns RDY to the write buffer, useful to determine the write bufferâ€™s average write latency (WB Write Latency/WB Write Beat)

Event.name: A1 stage stall
Event.Description: Counts the number of cycles ALU A1 is stalled

Event.name: L1 D-Cache read latency
Event.Description: Counts the number of cycles the data cache requests the bus for a read

Event.name: L1 D-Cache write latency
Event.Description: Counts the number of cycles the data cache requests the bus for a write

Event.name: BIU simultaneous access
Event.Description: Counts the number of cycles the bus is requested by more than one master

Event.name: WMMX2 hold issue stage
Event.Description: Counts the number of cycles the SIMD coprocessor holds in its Issue (IS) stage

Event.name: WMMX2 instruction FIFO full
Event.Description: Counts the number of cycles the SIMD coprocessor instruction buffer is full

Event.name: L2-Cache read hit
Event.Description: The number of read accesses served from the L2C

Event.name: L2-Cache read miss
Event.Description: The number of L2C read accesses that resulted in an external read request
